subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: In a masterful performance, Novak Djokovic defeated Radek Stepanek 6-7, 7-6, 5-7, 7-5, 7-6 in the second round of the U.S. Open.
snippet: In a masterful performance, Novak Djokovic defeated Radek Stepanek 6-7, 7-6, 5-7, 7-5, 7-6 in the second round of the U.S. Open.
